MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL55 postcode area of Llanrug, affecting properties in a widespread area. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by  10:00 am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:34 am on 23rd February, 2021.
